documentation.text:
@notice Returns the access of an address
@param _user The address to query

@notice Adds an address to the access list
@param _user The address to add

@notice Removes an address from the access list
@param _user The address to remove
@dev reverts if the caller does not have access

@notice Returns the access of an address
@param _user The address to query

@notice Adds an address to the access list
@param _user The address to add

@notice Removes an address from the access list
@param _user The address to remove
@dev reverts if the caller does not have access

devdoc.details: does not make any special permissions for externally, see SimpleReadAccessController for that.

acceptOwnership().details: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address, pending.

devdoc.title: SimpleWriteAccessController

addAccess(address).notice: Adds an address to the access list

hasAccess(address,bytes).notice: Returns the access of an address

removeAccess(address).notice: Removes an address from the access list

userdoc.notice: Gives access to accounts explicitly added to an access list by the controller's owner.
